Summary: Slow moving hovering UFO captured on film
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around December 18th 2004
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: >i just took these photos with my digital camera and was wondering if they can be analized? they were taken from my house in los angeles on dec 18th 2004 at around 11:30-40am. the object was moving extremely slow, almost not moving or hovering. there are aircraft that fly in the same general area but it was moving extremely slow and there were no contrails. also, it is obvious when it is an aircraft as i have seen them flying in the same area.the object looked very high in the sky and it dont think it was a baloon or anything. im just wondering if someone can check it out. im kind of curious as to what it was. attached are the photos
